Articles.Content:
I put together a cinematic video that's a "dramatic re-imagining" of my Grand Orbital Space Station challenge entry KOSTAR, a 270 ton station in Mun orbit.

Part 2 to follow when I get the time.

Edited October 1, 2015 by purpleivan

Now THATS how you film a rocket launch. Real good job. And I gotta say for the sound effects that weren't RealPlume I wish so bad that we could have that in KSP.

I'll be looking out for part two for sure.

Thanks.

I used a couple of audio clips of shuttle launches for the rocket sound. Even the clang of the umbilicals dropping was from one of these, I just had to line the audio up right with the video to get it in sync.

I didn't have Realplume for this, although I've downloaded it now. Looking forward to seeing the effect of that in-game.
